programme.title: A Tiger In Winter
programme.desc: On a winter day, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's apartment. He then begins a job as a substitute driver at night. One night, he meets his ex-girlfriend who now works as a novelist.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago in the past. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: An evil spirit that changes faces infiltrates a family, placing one brother in danger while the other tries to save him.

programme.title: The Pension
programme.desc: When four different couples head to a motel for different reasons, truths are revealed and secrets are uncovered.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Mourning Grave
programme.desc: In-su, with the ability to see ghosts, built a special friendship with a girl ghosts. Meanwhile, his classmates disappeared one by one and rumour says a masked ghost is the culprit.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: The Sheriff In Town
programme.desc: When a former police investigator from Busan suspects something off about a slick businessman from Seoul, the “sheriff” resolves to track his every move in order to keep his town safe.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo joins an elite team formed by a gangster-turned-investor who attempt their biggest scam to swindle $60,000,000 from the stock market.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: After barely surviving a violent attack by an elusive serial killer, a crime boss finds himself forming an unlikely partnership with a local detective to catch the sadistic killer.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Sori: Voice From The Heart
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: A Violent Prosecutor
programme.desc: After a prosecution lawyer is framed and convicted for murder, he tries to catch the real murderer from jail with the help of a con artist.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Bluebeard
programme.desc: A sedated patient confesses to his doctor that he and his son are both involved in an unsolved serial murder case.

programme.title: Rampant
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: Insane
programme.desc: Soo-A gets locked up at a psychiatric hospital against her will. One year later, a PD comes across her notebook with a detailed account of the cruelty she faced. He seeks her out to uncover the truth.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: I Can Speak
programme.desc: An elderly woman forms an unlikely friendship with a junior civil service officer. After realizing that he is proficient in English, she begs he officer to teach her, for reasons of her own.

programme.title: The Wicked
programme.desc: Sae Young is the new hire at a small office treated harshly by her manager. After picking on Sae Young in her backhanded ways, she soon finds herself the target of Sae Young's wicked ways.

programme.title: A Special Lady
programme.desc: A woman who becomes the second-in-command of a gangster organization-turned-leading business entity, fights against the ruthless world of man's society, to protect her only son.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Mourning Grave
programme.desc: In-su, with the ability to see ghosts, built a special friendship with a girl ghosts. Meanwhile, his classmates disappeared one by one and rumour says a masked ghost is the culprit.

programme.title: The Berlin File
programme.desc: A North Korean agent in Berlin is betrayed and cut loose when a weapons deal is exposed. He tries to escape being purged, while being pursued by a North and South Korean operative.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: A handful of people are recruited to live stream a horror show at Gonjiam, Korea's most haunted hospital. To attract more viewers, scares are set up along the way, but soon things take a darker turn.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Will You Be There?
programme.desc: A surgeon’s dying wish is to see his lover who had died in an accident long ago. He receives pills that allow him to travel back in time and tries to save her. There, he also meets his younger self.

programme.title: The Great Battle
programme.desc: A historical film about the siege of Ansi Fortress and the epic 88 days battle that Yang Man-chun and his Goguryeo troops fought against 200,000 invading Tang dynasty men to defend it.

programme.title: Missing: The Other Side Ep12
programme.desc: Kim Wook, an ex-swindler, accidentally arrives at a village where the missing dead live. While helping the villagers solve the mystery of deaths, he finds out why he’s the only one able to see them…

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent Ep3
programme.desc: Enjoy the virtual tour with the 4 actors! They'll go on camping trips in Europe - rental cars instead of trains, campgrounds instead of hotels, and local marts instead of restaurants.

programme.title: On & Off Ep11
programme.desc: “On & Off” is a reality show where K-celebrities share their “on” moments while they’re at work and “off” moments of their private lives spent behind cameras.

programme.title: One Night Food Trip- International Edition Ep8
programme.desc: Stay tuned to this spin-off of “One Night Food Trip” toured by Korean and local celebrities and find out the delicacies you can't miss in different Asian countries!

programme.title: One Night Food Trip- International Edition Ep9
programme.desc: Stay tuned to this spin-off of “One Night Food Trip” toured by Korean and local celebrities and find out the delicacies you can't miss in different Asian countries!

programme.title: EXchange 2 Ep19
programme.desc: Dating reality show <EXchange> is back with season 2! When the ex-couples reunite and start building relationships with each other, will they get back with their ex or date someone new?

programme.title: Mental Coach Jegal Ep15
programme.desc: Jegal Gil, a Taekwondo athlete who is permanently expelled from the national team due to an accident, returns to the athlete’s village and becomes a mental coach to help players in slump.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep795796
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44894490
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1951
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3495
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1757
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep880
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: A police officer Tai is found seriously hurt while another officer Ling is found lying in a coma at the crime scene. Ling awakens with a memory loss and cannot explain why he was at the scene. As a result, he is accused of attempted murder. While Ling feels aggrieved, he also finds all evidences pointing to him as the murderer...

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppy’s owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Zu:WarriorsFrom Magic Mountain
programme.desc: A classic fantasy action movie about the epic battles between celestial swordsmen and the Evil Force. Set on the mythical Zu mountain range, a mysterious land where ordinary men dare not venture, the legend has it that skilful swordsmen protect civilians by fending off evil. Featuring Sammo Hung, Yuen Biao and Adam Cheng and directed by Tsui Hark.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: Hong Kong Police officer Li travels to Thailand to search for his daughter when she disappears mysteriously. He teams up with a local detective to investigate and they chance upon a black market organ smuggling ring which could throw light on his daughter’s whereabouts...

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension…

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her father’s restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Meow
programme.desc: Earth has always been home to the aliens called Meow since ancient times. This species has now transformed into ordinary cats living among humans all over the world. Xi Xi Li is the last Meow who comes to Earth with the intention of invading it. However, his plan gets derailed when a family in Hong Kong takes him in as a pet.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung’s house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung’s mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief’s illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father’s death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General’s henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and become patriotic heroes accidentally. Assisted by a warlord’s daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord in this action comedy.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn’s beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong’s concubine as he knows Dong’s adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master’s daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and managed to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Fresh from his smashing directorial debut comedy Let's Make Laugh, Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return…

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King’s sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong’s caught in the Mong’s territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping’s limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: One of the most far-out, fantastical films ever made in Chinese movie history, this pays tribute to the Japanese superhero trend in the 1970s. It tells the story of the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan, who is transformed from a young lab researcher to a superhero battling the crazy and ambitious monsters of the ice age.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - “Black Leopard”. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of “Black Leopard”, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperor’s tomb.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Bells of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Yaan
programme.desc: Chandru, a jobless man, vows to get a job after the father of his girlfriend opposes their relationship. His joy on getting a job in an Islamic nation ends when he is nabbed there for carrying drugs.

programme.title: Vikram Vedha
programme.desc: A tough police officer sets out to track down and kill an equally tough gangster.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Thumbaa
programme.desc: Hari and Umapathy, two painters, meet Varsha, a wildlife photographer, while working in a forest. Soon, they team up to stop a corrupt officer from capturing a tiger, Thumbaa.

programme.title: Enna Solla Pogirai
programme.desc: Vikram, a young man, plans to make his fiancee fall in love with him. However, when his plan backfires, he finds himself embroiled in a love triangle.

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: When Kishaloy shifts to Kolkata and looks for a place to live, he is rejected by most landlords as he is a bachelor. When he finally manages to find a home, he lies about his marital status.

programme.title: Junga
programme.desc: Junga is involved in a fight, because of which his family loses the theatre that they own. In order to get it back, he devises a plan that takes him to Paris, where he fights a criminal gang.

programme.title: Killadi Marumagan
programme.desc: The son of an egoistic businessman falls in love with an egoistic girl and has to convince her egoistic mother in order to marry her.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends, with their new boss Gouravam, come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant. Their plans get messed up when Saravanan falls for Aishwarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

programme.title: The Priest
programme.desc: Father Carmen, a priest, joins hands with the police to investigate a series of mysterious suicides. However, he soon stumbles upon a disturbing fact that has serious consequences.

programme.title: Kattapava Kanom
programme.desc: Pandya is considered unlucky by everyone, in spite of which Meena marries him. Kattappa, a lucky goldfish gets stolen from its owner and lands in Pandya's house and his luck changes.

programme.title: Kanni Raasi
programme.desc: Gemini, a young man, is averse to love and relationships. However, when Anjali, a teacher, moves in next door, she falls for him and tries to change his mind.

programme.title: Vyjayanthi Ips
programme.desc: Vyjayanthi is a police officer who is dedicated to her work. When she arrests a young man who was involved in a sexual assault case, his father vows to kill her.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Ignoring her misgivings, a young woman purchases a vintage car, which seems to have a mind of its own. Further investigation reveals that it is possessed by a vengeful spirit with ties to her past.

programme.title: Thiruttu Payale 2
programme.desc: An honest police officer is tasked with taping the calls of elite professionals by a senior official. On the job, he learns about an online sociopath and sets out to expose him.

programme.title: Kanaa
programme.desc: A woman who hails from a middle-class family background aims to excel in the competitive world of cricket with the help of her supportive father.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Ivan Kavalkaran
programme.desc: Ivan Kavalkaran is the story of Vijay (Bellamkonda Srinivas) a sincere and dynamic police officer who gets stuck in a kidnap case which turns his life upside down as the entire department and society turns against him. He has 24 hours to prove his innocence and get back to his respectable life. Will he be able to do that?

programme.title: Irandam Ulagaporin Kadaisi Gundu
programme.desc: A lorry driver ends up in possession of an unexploded bomb that is being sought after by both the cops and pro-peace activists.

programme.title: Achamindri
programme.desc: Sakthi, a pickpocket, and Sathya, a police officer, must work together to find out who is responsible for a series of deaths and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep56
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep34
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep36
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep42
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep43
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep24
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep25
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep05
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: An honest police officer, Prabhakaran, puts a notorious gangster, Easwaramoorthy, behind bars. When Easwaramoorthy learns of his identity, he decides to take revenge by targeting Prabhakaran's sister.

programme.title: Super Star
programme.desc: Kunal belongs to a middle-class family and aspires to become a film star. He gets his dream opportunity when he is asked to stand in for Karan, a producer's son who looks exactly like him, in a film.

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: Dr Anmol, a dentist and henpecked husband, lives a miserable existence in New York due to his domineering wife. However, his troubles increase when he unwittingly gets embroiled in a mafia rivalry.

programme.title: Gollu Aur Pappu
programme.desc: Two brothers, Gollu and Pappu, confront Gustaad Khan, a terrorist, for blowing up their garage. However, he decides to take advantage of their innocence by making them deploy a bomb in Ludhiana.

programme.title: Athiratha
programme.desc: Following the family legacy, an engineering graduate takes up the job of a TV journalist. One day, he is arrested in connection to a banking scandal and must prove his innocence.

programme.title: Athiratha
programme.desc: Following the family legacy, an engineering graduate takes up the job of a TV journalist. One day, he is arrested in connection to a banking scandal and must prove his innocence.

programme.title: Om Shanti Om
programme.desc: Om, a junior film artist, is smitten by Shantipriya, a renowned actress, but is killed while trying to save her from a fire accident. Thirty years later, he is reborn and sets out to avenge her death.

programme.title: Ghar Ho To Aisa
programme.desc: Amar's mother rules her house like a dictator and tortures her daughter-in-law, Sharda. After Sharda and her daughter die, Amar decides to teach his cruel family a lesson with the help of Seema.

programme.title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
programme.desc: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to get married to an NRI. When she visits Delhi to shop for her trousseau, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree man, and falls in love with him.

programme.title: Zindagi Ek Sangharsh
programme.desc: When the lives of five individuals living in different places intersect, it results in the transformation of their persona and purpose.

programme.title: Maya Memsaab
programme.desc: Maya is a married woman who finds herself seeking more than her marriage as she is bored. She has many affairs and eventually dies mysteriously, leaving the authorities confused.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: Direct Ishq
programme.desc: Vicky, a rough local of Varanasi, covets Dolly who wishes to become a professional singer. Complications ensue when Kabeer, a rich event organiser, takes a fancy to her while helping her succeed.

programme.title: Welcome
programme.desc: Two thugs meet Rajiv, who belongs to a respectable family, and want to fix their sister's wedding with him. However, when Rajiv's uncle refuses to the match, a series of hilarious situations occur.

programme.title: Hera Pheri
programme.desc: Two tenants and a landlord, in desperate need of money, chance upon a ransom call via a cross connection. They hatch a plan to claim the ransom for themselves.

programme.title: Zila Ghaziabad
programme.desc: A full-blown gang war comes to life in the district of Ghaziabad with the rise of the rivalry between gangsters Fauji and Satbir. A corrupt policeman, Pritam Singh, is sent down to set things right.

programme.desc: A full-blown gang war comes to life in the district of Ghaziabad with the rise of the rivalry between gangsters Fauji and Satbir. A corrupt policeman, Pritam Singh, is sent down to set things right.

programme.title: Ishqiya
programme.desc: Khalujan and Babban, two rogues, fall in love with Krishna, their friend's widow. However, Krishna manipulates them into carrying out her bidding for her selfish gain.

programme.title: Soldier
programme.desc: After Major Vijay Malhotra's colleagues betray him, he is branded as a traitor and subsequently killed. But his son, Vicky, vows to take revenge on his father's murderers and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Shaandaar
programme.desc: Jagjinder Joginder, a wedding planner, brings together the dysfunctional family of businessman Bipin Arora while making arrangements for his daughter's destination wedding in London.

programme.desc: Rupinder Singh Gandhi, a sportsman and daring leader, must battle various obstacles when a few decisions, taken by him and his friends, land them on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Global Baba
programme.desc: Pehlwaan, a criminal, narrowly escapes a police encounter and uses a holy man's guise to hide. Though he soon amasses a large number of followers, he continues to carry out his illegal activities.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Sagar, Sam and Aarav decide to dive underwater to find treasure in a sunken ship in order to help Sam clear his debt. However, one of them has a hidden agenda of his own.

programme.title: Ram Aur Shyam
programme.desc: Ram escapes from his home when he learns that his abusive brother-in-law plans to kill him. Justice is meted out when Shyam, Ram's long-lost twin, accidentally takes his place.

programme.desc: Irving Berlin's songs and dances are performed by two happy couples who discover that love, romance and a Christmas Eve snowfall make everyone's dreams come true. The beloved title song of this film was introduced in the film HOLIDAY INN.

programme.desc: A respected criminal psychologist battles for her sanity and freedom when she is accused of a crime of which she has no memory.

programme.title: French Kiss
programme.desc: A woman flying to France to confront her straying fiance gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.

programme.title: For Heaven's Sake (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The Lead - An interview sheds new light on a troubling comment made on a hunting trip years before and leads Mike and Jackson to investigate a lake on private property.

programme.title: Blockbusters (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Frank vs. Zeenah and Arjuns - Dara Ó Briain schools our sixth former contestants Frank, Zeenah, and Arjuns as they take on this iconic trivia-based quiz for the chance to win some epic prizes! No phones allowed.

programme.title: The Day the Music Died: The Story of Don McLean's American Pie
programme.desc: Don McLean's iconic song "American Pie" is explored and examined through the lens of its 50 year legacy.

programme.title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep17
programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Blockbusters (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Adam vs. Tia and Amy - Dara Ó Briain schools our sixth former contestants Adam, Tia, and Amy as they take on this iconic trivia-based quiz for the chance to win some epic prizes! No phones allowed.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The World is Purple - Beth and Rip deliberate right and wrong, good and evil. The Duttons are forced into a tense standoff with their corporate nemesis. Thomas Rainwater receives some uncomfortable counsel.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: The Elysian Kingdom - The U.S.S. Enterprise becomes stuck in a nebula that is home to an alien consciousness that traps the crew in a fairy tale.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: After a high-tech, secret weapon is stolen by the mysterious and evil Cobra organization, the G.I. Joes must race against time to stop Cobra from using the weapon and plunging the world into chaos.

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep18
programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: A Month By The Lake
programme.desc: An attractive older guest at the Lake Como Resort has her eye on a handsome, well-to-do bachelor, and will go to outrageous lengths to reel in her wealthy catch.

programme.title: Kakak Ampai
programme.desc: Shikin, a 25-year-old Malay lady, goes out of the norm to pursue her career as an Anti-Narcotic officer.

programme.title: Eggshell
programme.desc: Charis, a single working mother is suddenly brought into turmoil when she discovers that her domestic helper, Maria is pregnant. The situation is further complicated when Maria reveals that she was raped, leaving Charis in a moral dilemma.

programme.title: The Weather Man
programme.desc: A weather man who lives with his wife and kids in Chicago must deal with problems which arise from wanting to move to New York.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: All Those Who Wander - The U.S.S. Enterprise crew comes face-to-face with their demons - and scary monsters too - when their landing party is stranded on a barren planet with a ravenous enemy.

programme.title: FBI (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot - After a bomb explosion devastates a residential apartment building, special agents Maggie Bell and Omar Adom "OA" Zidan of the New York office of the FBI investigate a possible war between rival gangs.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths befalls their small town, an offbeat group of friends.

programme.title: Lilly's Bewitched Christmas
programme.desc: Young Lilly summons Ruprecht, a nasty helper from her fairy tale book, to teach her naughty brother a lesson. However, when Ruprecht starts wreaking havoc, she is forced to time travel back to the Middle Ages to find a way to reverse the spell.

programme.title: Leander's Final Journey
programme.desc: In this drama about reconciling the past with the present and the power of hope, a former WWII officer travels to Ukraine with his granddaughter to find the only woman he ever loved - just as a new war breaks out in the former Soviet Union in 2014.

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents
programme.desc: Marie is a single mother, saddled with bank debts and running a farm. Philip, manager of the bank, goes to her farm to foreclose it but crashes his car upon arrival. Capitalising on Peter’s resultant amnesia, Marie convinces him that he is her husband.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: A Summer in Croatia
programme.desc: Ena’s fiancé cancels the planned wedding - but just then she learns that she has a family in Croatia. At the sea, under the southern sun, she not only meets her loving grandmother but also a hostile sister-in-law and a romantically inclined fisherman.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Married couple, Luca and Susi, are facing problems at work and they struggle to support their family of four. When Mary, their new au pair arrives, her presence lights up the dull household and her beauty captivates the lovestruck Luca and his son.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 1
programme.desc: Paula’s fresh start in Vietnam is a disaster: Her passport is confiscated, the appointment for her job falls through, and she ends up in the hospital after her handbag is stolen. The revelation that she has a twin sister there turns her world upside down.

programme.title: The Boss In The Kitchen
programme.desc: In this rib-tickling comedy, the Coso family lives an under-the-radar life in a small Italian town. However, when their uncle Cyrus, who has been put under house arrest for mafia crimes, arrive at their doorstep, their quiet lives are disrupted.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: The Winters
programme.desc: The Winters family undergoes an upheaval when Marie, the daughter, relocates to Berlin. Tanja plans on divorcing Matthias, leaving him with a wounded pride. He fights to save his marriage but fails, until he rediscovers a new perspective in life.

programme.title: Lilly's Bewitched Christmas
programme.desc: Young Lilly summons Ruprecht, a nasty helper from her fairy tale book, to teach her naughty brother a lesson. However, when Ruprecht starts wreaking havoc, she is forced to time travel back to the Middle Ages to find a way to reverse the spell.

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents
programme.desc: Marie is a single mother, saddled with bank debts and running a farm. Philip, manager of the bank, goes to her farm to foreclose it but crashes his car upon arrival. Capitalising on Peter’s resultant amnesia, Marie convinces him that he is her husband.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: Ms Busche
programme.desc: After her son leaves for college, Katrin, a single mother, finds love again. However, her happiness is fleeting as challenges implode in her life. Her father has an accident, her ex-husband tries to repossess the house and her son unexpectedly returns home.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Married couple, Luca and Susi, are facing problems at work and they struggle to support their family of four. When Mary, their new au pair arrives, her presence lights up the dull household and her beauty captivates the lovestruck Luca and his son.

programme.title: The Spy
programme.desc: Inspired by a thrilling spy story featuring Nazi Germany’s top female spy, Vera von Schalburg. Known as “The Beautiful Spy”, she mysteriously vanished after being caught by the British secret service MI5. Woman, mother, mistress, spy – and double agent.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 1
programme.desc: Paula’s fresh start in Vietnam is a disaster: Her passport is confiscated, the appointment for her job falls through, and she ends up in the hospital after her handbag is stolen. The revelation that she has a twin sister there turns her world upside down.

programme.title: Opposites Attract
programme.desc: Claudia is a divorce lawyer. Stefano is a couple’s therapist. Both are single adults with offices opposite one another. When they start seeing one another’s clients, fiery rivalry and sizzling passion erupt in this modern Italian love story.

programme.title: The Boss In The Kitchen
programme.desc: In this rib-tickling comedy, the Coso family lives an under-the-radar life in a small Italian town. However, when their uncle Cyrus, who has been put under house arrest for mafia crimes, arrive at their doorstep, their quiet lives are disrupted.

programme.title: Duisburg
programme.desc: Based on the real-life “Ferragosto Massacre”, six young Calabrians are killed by assassins outside of a restaurant. Inspectors Battaglia and Block are tasked to manage the case and they discover a bloodthirsty family feud behind the brutal murders.

programme.title: The Violin Teacher
programme.desc: Laerte, a talented violinist, is forced to teach in a public school in a Brazilian slum after failing to get into the renowned São Paulo Symphonic Orchestra. Laerte grows closer to his students but has to make a difficult choice between them and his dream.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 2
programme.desc: After getting bitten by a snake and waking up in a remote village in Vietnam, Paula sets off on her quest to find her twin sister and the doctor who had treated her. However, she soon learns of her sister’s dark secret.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: Ms Busche
programme.desc: After her son leaves for college, Katrin, a single mother, finds love again. However, her happiness is fleeting as challenges implode in her life. Her father has an accident, her ex-husband tries to repossess the house and her son unexpectedly returns home.

programme.title: The Spy

programme.desc: Claudia is a divorce lawyer. Stefano is a couple’s therapist. Both are single adults with offices opposite one another. When they start seeing one another’s clients, fiery rivalry and sizzling passion erupt in this modern Italian love story.

programme.desc: Based on the real-life “Ferragosto Massacre”, six young Calabrians are killed by assassins outside of a restaurant. Inspectors Battaglia and Block are tasked to manage the case and they discover a bloodthirsty family feud behind the brutal murders.

programme.title: A Summer in Tuscany
programme.desc: Laura, a journalist, travels to Italy to investigate illegal fashion labour practices and find out more about a family secret. She is soon courted by the charming lawyer Alessandro, but eventually realizes that he isn’t all that he proclaims to be.

programme.title: The Violin Teacher
programme.desc: Laerte, a talented violinist, is forced to teach in a public school in a Brazilian slum after failing to get into the renowned São Paulo Symphonic Orchestra. Laerte grows closer to his students but has to make a difficult choice between them and his dream.

programme.title: Kids Run
programme.desc: Andi is a former boxer who now struggles as a day labourer. When he loses his job suddenly, he finds himself threatened with the loss of custody of his beloved three children. An amateur boxing competition with a huge prize money becomes his only hope.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 2
programme.desc: After getting bitten by a snake and waking up in a remote village in Vietnam, Paula sets off on her quest to find her twin sister and the doctor who had treated her. However, she soon learns of her sister’s dark secret.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: Pelican Blood
programme.desc: Weibke and her nine-year-old daughter Nicolina are elated when they finally adopt five-year-old Raya. However, Weibke soon notices Raya displaying abnormally aggressive behavior. With advice from experts, Weibke is forced to make a painful decision.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 6
programme.desc: An unexpected trio emerges in the mission to take down Cortés, as Arman and Nadia’s relationship hits a breaking point. Fiona attempts to keep her family safe.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 11
programme.desc: Riggs & Murtaugh go up against one of their own when the killing of a Texas Ranger leads them to possible corruption. The case is complicated by a dark secret from Avery's past.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 15
programme.desc: Howard receives some shocking news as everyone prepares for the reopening of Stuart's comic book store, and Penny teaches Sheldon how to "let it go."

programme.title: Friends S7 16
programme.desc: Chandler finds out who Monica really wanted to have sex with on the night they became lovers. Ross is furious after Rachel teaches Ben practical jokes.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 02
programme.desc: Lisbon goes undercover in prison to bust a car theft ring.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour. In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction. Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 25
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip out to Hawaii for an auction at a marine life park. T-Money places his bet on what's in a locked cabinet, while Brandon and Lori smell a great deal with old medical equipment.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 3
programme.desc: With only a commonplace name, an old address and dim memories as leads, Veronica and Wallace attempt to help classmate Justin Smith (BOBBY EDNER) find his father, who disappeared 10 years earlier. Meanwhile, as Veronica experiences some complicatedfeelings towards ex-boyfriend Duncan and new romantic interest Troy (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), guidance counselor Rebecca James (PAULA MARSHALL) calls Keith to the school to discuss the recent, dramatic changes in his daughter's life. Later, Duncan struggles with ways to cope with his sister's death as the anniversary of her murder approaches.

programme.title: Gotham S1 19
programme.desc: As Fish plots her escape from the Dollmaker, Gordon and Bullock investigate a cold case involving the Ogre, a serial killer who targets young women in Gotham City.

programme.desc: Naomi must decide to protect those she loves most, but in the end, Naomi needs those closest to her to battle a powerful being that has been hunting her since birth.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep03
programme.desc: Guerilla My Dreams - Conflicts arise when a wounded Korean woman is brought into the 4077th. Hawkeye merely sees a patient in need but a South Korean Lieutenant sees a potential guerrilla fighter in need of questioning. Hawkeye has serious reservations about handing his patient over to the lieutenant, who has a history of torturing and even murdering his prisoners. Unfortunately, it is not a decision for him to make and he must watch as strangers make decisions that will affect the future of his patient.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep04
programme.desc: Goodbye Radar - Part 1 - Radar is on leave in Tokyo just when his skills are needed most back at the 4077th. The generator breaks down just as a wave of heavy casualties hit the unit and Radar’s office clerk substitute, Klinger, lacks the experience to wheel and deal to get a new one. While Klinger tries to cut through military red tape, Radar receives some stunning news on his vacation: his uncle has passed away and he is now the only O’Reilly male; the family farm needs him. The Army has given Radar permission to go home. Klinger is frantically on the wire trying to find a new generator by any means neccesary while night falls on the 4077th. Radar returns briefly to the 4077th to gather up his belongings and say his goodbyes. He does leave one thing behind: his teddy bear, as a gift for Hawkeye.

But, what he doesn't know, is that they're friends and traveling together. The Captain's (Gavin MacLeod) godson (Grant Goodeve) brings his wife (Bess Armstrong) on the cruise for a belated honeymoon, because he was called to military service and was away for two years. Two brothers (Sonny Bono and Marty Ingels) come on board to sue the cruise line, by having one of them fake an injury. The crew suspects he's faking but, unless they can get him to stand up, they're at the brothers' mercy.

programme.desc: A Different Girl/ Man Who Loved Women/ Oh, My Aching Brother - A womanizer (David Doyle) hits on three women (Jo Ann Pflug, Brett Somers, Cathryn Damon) and they're all taken with him. But, what he doesn't know, is that they're friends and traveling together. The Captain's (Gavin MacLeod) godson (Grant Goodeve) brings his wife (Bess Armstrong) on the cruise for a belated honeymoon, because he was called to military service and was away for two years. Two brothers (Sonny Bono and Marty Ingels) come on board to sue the cruise line, by having one of them fake an injury. The crew suspects he's faking but, unless they can get him to stand up, they're at the brothers' mercy.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep01
programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part I - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep08
programme.desc: The Very Informal Dress - Aunt Clara provides Samantha and Darrin with new clothes to wear at an important cocktail party for prospective client Charles Barlow.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep07
programme.desc: Night of the Tarantula - While visiting a friend (Shani Wallis) in Jamaica, Jessica encounters voodoo and black magic when a family celebration is marred by murder.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep05
programme.desc: Goodbye Radar - Part 2 - Radar is on leave in Tokyo just when his skills are needed most back at the 4077th. The generator breaks down just as a wave of heavy casualties hit the unit and Radar’s office clerk substitute, Klinger, lacks the experience to wheel and deal to get a new one. While Klinger tries to cut through military red tape, Radar receives some stunning news on his vacation: his uncle has passed away and he is now the only O’Reilly male; the family farm needs him. The Army has given Radar permission to go home. Klinger is frantically on the wire trying to find a new generator by any means neccesary while night falls on the 4077th. Radar returns briefly to the 4077th to gather up his belongings and say his goodbyes. He does leave one thing behind: his teddy bear as a gift for Hawkeye.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep06
programme.desc: Period of Adjustment - Radar O’ Reilly has returned to the states and the entire 4077th is having adjustment problems. Klinger and B.J. are suffering the most for two very different reasons. Klinger has been assigned the responsibility of Radar’s old job and it doesn’t take long before the complaints and jabs about his inefficiency begin to wear him down. Meanwhile, B.J.’s homesickness is magnified when he hears news that his young daughter mistook Radar for him at the San Francisco airport, calling the young clerk “Daddy”. Klinger nearly reaches the boiling point with his new job and resents that he is not being given any slack in learning all of the tasks related to his job. Luckily for both men they are aided by their friends in the unit. Potter and Father Mulcahy help Klinger to see that Radar wasn’t a perfect clerk from day one, while Hawkeye provides a sympathetic ear to B.J.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep175
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S10 Ep19
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep5
programme.desc: Face The Strange - The NCIS team investigates the death of a Navy commander whose body suddenly explodes before Jimmy can examine it

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep6

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep7
programme.desc: Docked - NCIS investigates the death of a man on a cruise ship whose body is discovered in the ship’s sauna by none other than McGee’s mother-in-law, Judy (Patricia Richardson)

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep8
programme.desc: Peacekeeper - NCIS investigates the case of a Navy reservist whose body is found in a beat-up car at the end of a gun range. Also, Kasie weighs the pros and cons of buying a gun.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Never Trust A Stranger - The team welcomes a new member, Special Agent Tiffany Wallace, as they search for killers who orchestrated a mass shooting at a media company, and OA’s personal connection with the case threatens to cloud his judgement.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Unreasonable Doubt - The team races to stop an active serial killer after three women are found weighted down at the bottom of a lake, and Jubal looks into an old closed case after there are multiple similarities to the recent victims.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Liar's Poker - When the leader of a drug cartel and one of the world’s most wanted men, Antonio Vargas , is apprehended by the team, the entire FBI headquarters is put at risk when his henchmen unveil a terroristic threat to free him.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep4

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Clean Slate - As the team searches for a young girl who was kidnapped from a cabin during a family vacation, they discover that the abduction may be tied to a skeleton in her family’s closet.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Uncovered - The team must infiltrate a drug trafficking gang after the robbery of a chemical plant leaves two customs agents dead. Also, Nestor (Josh Segarra) offers his help on the case, giving Maggie new insight into his character

programme.desc: Portugal - Adventurer Ben Fogle journeys to the mountains of central Portugal, to live with Alex, a British man who traded in his lucrative retail career for his own mountainside hideaway. Later, Ben lollipops trees to protect them from forest fires.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep1
programme.desc: Food Factory serves up chocolate pizza, crispy jalapeno poppers, a thirst-quenching pilsner, and a sweet chipotle chili.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Food Factory goes trick-or-treating for candy corn, booger lollipops, spooktacular gummies, and hand-frosted jack'o'lantern cookies.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Residents - Cities may seem unlikely havens for wildlife, but for animals able to adapt, the urban world is filled with opportunity. This first episode examines what it takes for wild animals to thrive in the fastest changing habitat on the planet.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In the first instalment Joanna explores the incredible islands of Japan, before jumping on board the Trans-Siberian Railway into Russia.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep5
programme.desc: In the US a man and his dog take cover as a rare tornado outbreak rips through towns on the East coast. In Norway, a boxer has the fight of his life when a swim under the ice goes disastrously wrong and in Western Australia, a homeowner is in a faceoff with the flames.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S4 Ep5
programme.desc: New Caledonia - Robson's journey takes him to New Caledonia, home to the world's largest lagoon - and a place in which new fish species are still being discovered.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Crocodiles Ep3
programme.desc: Lurking in the waterways of Queensland and the Northern Territory live the largest living reptiles on Earth; they’re among the most dangerous animals in Australia. Crocodiles are formidable predators, superbly adapted to aquatic life, with skull crushing jaws and lightning speed. They were on earth long before the dinosaurs, and have outlived them by millions of years. Now they’re protected in Australia and their numbers have surged in recent years.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - Rock Splitter Ep4
programme.desc: The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - The Hollow Heart Ep5
programme.desc: This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years… that can withstand the harshest conditions… and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any other…the enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Savanna Ep3
programme.desc: The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it’s head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Battle Lines Ep1
programme.desc: As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Dingo Ep2
programme.desc: This wild dog has been on Australia’s shores for at least three-and-a-half-thousand years and is believed to be descended from the Asian wolf; but canis lupus dingo is a distinct species, different from both the wolf and the domestic dog.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Crocodiles Ep3
programme.desc: Lurking in the waterways of Queensland and the Northern Territory live the largest living reptiles on Earth; they’re among the most dangerous animals in Australia.
