programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 - Invisible Signals Ep3
programme.desc: Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - India Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome to India – a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Dingo Ep2
programme.desc: This wild dog has been on Australia’s shores for at least three-and-a-half-thousand years and is believed to be descended from the Asian wolf; but canis lupus dingo is a distinct species, different from both the wolf and the domestic dog.

Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - The Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Travel to coastlines around the world, where conflict over food and accommodation leads to desperate battles for survival. Watch as penguins’ delightful dispositions turn toward murderous rage, and join a humpback whale trying to protect her calf.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Canada Ep6
programme.desc: Canada, where summer is short and time is tight – any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Under Pressure Ep2
programme.desc: As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale Ep1
programme.desc: The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkey’s paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - The Predator's Plight Ep1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight Ep5
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amanda’s team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the center’s baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - Rock Splitter Ep4
programme.desc: The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits Ep6
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South America Ep7
programme.desc: From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Southeast Asia Ep8
programme.desc: With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill – on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Risk and Reward Ep3
programme.desc: The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Leaving Home Ep2
programme.desc: An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lanka’s kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle… and there’s a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Remarkable Reptiles Ep4
programme.desc: Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. They’ve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Crocodile Capers Ep6
programme.desc: Strap in for Dr. Amanda’s risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, who’s headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits Ep6
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Nintendo Quest
programme.desc: 1 man. 30 days, 678 games. No online purchases. This special showcases the adventure of Jay Bartlett, a fanatic collector in pursuit of his dream to own a complete official North American NES library.

programme.title: 12th Esports World Championship Dota 2 Regional Tournaments Ep11
programme.desc: The DOTA2 Asia regional qualifiers of the 12th Esports World Championship features athletes from all over the world will compete for one of the highest esports achievements available.

programme.title: Innovation Nation (S14) Ep6
programme.desc: Cactus Leather - Host Mo Rocca shows us: The ultimate electric motorcycle. The inventor who created phone calls over the internet. Turning cacti into leather. And, the planning it takes to create a village.

programme.title: Black Mirror (S2) Ep1

programme.desc: & Usher. There are teen idols...and then there are Jobros and Usher. Both have been in the music biz for decades, and we have the footage to prove it! (S1, ep6)

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep23
programme.desc: Chet Vs Dr. Disorder / Damselfly In Distress - Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Something'S Glotta Give / Afternoon Contrite - Lucretia plays cupid to try to bring Lotta and Gerald together. When Lotta thinks she broke up the Bloogey Boys, she sets out to reunite them.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep23
programme.desc: The Royal Strutters / Impromptu Cruise - After pulling a sword from a tree, Sage is crowned king for the day. Archibald wins a fancy vacation aboard a luxury cruise.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep23
programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep49
programme.desc: Rekindling Retreat / Trashbassador - Tip and Oh accidentally go to a Couples' Retreat/Tip and Oh help Traffic Cone Larry run against Smek for a local government position

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep25
programme.desc: Cleo & Zaid - Cleo and Zaid finally find the Uta Tablet, but the people guarding it want Cleo to stay and be their Queen. Which, like, is definitely not the worst offer she's ever gotten.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch A Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep49
programme.desc: The Wrath Of Morticus Khan - King Julien clones himself but things take a turn for the worse when Morticus Khan, an evil warlord, unleashes an army of Mort clones on the kingdom

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Crazy Caustic Spray Of The Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house – or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep23
programme.desc: Sherman Exchange Program/Charles Dickens - Sherman trades places with a kid Emperor and learns that being king is harder than it seems and Peabody's new co-host is out of control

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep22
programme.desc: Smoovin On Up / The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep23
programme.desc: Shock And Awe - When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Lantern - Rupert, Edward and Bill go camping. Rupert is excited at the idea of playing ‘explorers' but as darkness falls the friends are frightened by strange shadows and noises.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Rupert’S Treasure Hunt - Raggety is getting the wood tidy for the annual visit of the Spring Inspector. If it's not looking its best, Spring won't go ahead and Raggety needs help from Rupert and his friends

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep9
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep10
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip'S Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep62
programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The Hamazing Hamsterman - Dennis gets into a fluffy mess when he runs into Von Screwtop's Hadron Collider with the Professor’s pet hamster, Galahad. To stop Dennis from completely transforming into a hamster, the gang must sneak him into Wilbur’s lab to reverse the physical (and mental) reaction!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Prank Wars - Dennis discovers that Ralf, the janitor, is the legendary Prankmaster General and is told he could become his successor. Walter can’t let this happen and challenges him to a prank battle to win the infamous Prankypedia.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep31
programme.desc: The Journey - A paladinis trapped in a distant Galra outpost

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep5
programme.desc: Stink Of Fear: Chapter Five - When Fearless Leader brainwashes Bullwinkle, Rocky must team up with Director Peachfuzz to stop them from making the stinky pie and taking over the world

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep5
programme.desc: Ants Ants Revolution / Clamsquatch - A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep24
programme.desc: Slide - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Four Flamingos / The Roaring Rooster - Archibald eats too many beets and teams up with lumberjacks for a logging competition. Sage tries to earn all his Roaring Rooster badges in one day.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Trashy Tale Of The Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House Of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Cj Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep24
programme.desc: Disaster Of Puppets/Love Will Eep Us Together - Thunk invents ventriloquism when he tries (and fails) at stand-up comedy, but he gets jealous when Ahhh! Valley thinks the puppet is the real comedian/Eep is determined for two buffalippos to find love when Grug denies her dating privileges.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep23
programme.desc: Nuttypunny / Jealohsy - When Tip can't win at the Boov game of Nuttypunny, her identity is challenged; Oh tries to win back Krunkle's affection with misguided help from Tip.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Charged Up - Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. ‘Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying ‘Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. ‘What's happening?' questions Elephant. ‘Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely ‘Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep21
programme.desc: The Case Of The Snow Mystery - It's Christmas Day and Noddy's got a new snowglobe. He wishes it would snow outside but Big Ears tells him that it has never snowed in Toyland. Noddy uses all his investigating skills to works out that by combining Smartysaurus glitter experiment with Deltoid's soccer ball and using Revs' lights, he can light up the DareDale caves with beautiful snowflake images just like the inside of his snowglove. If anyone can make it snow in Toyland, Noddy can! Hurrah!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep22
programme.desc: The Case Of The Wonky Toys - All the toys in Toyland are visiting Fuse's workshop for a toy check but something is wrong! Toys are fine before the check and wonky after! Noddy investigates why toys are going wonky so that he can help them return to normal quickly. With the help of his wwwbook and following all the clues Noddy works out that Fuse has given himself a robot upgrade to help him do the toy checks quickly but he installed it incorrectly. That's why he's been making the toys go wonky! Noddy helps Fuse uninstall the upgrade and soon everyone is back to normal. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep21
programme.desc: How Can We Make Music For Mimi? - Mimi has lost the handle to her music box and can't hear her music. Jess works out how to make instruments and get all the friends involved in making a little orchestra and performing a fantastic song to cheer mimi up.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep22
programme.desc: How Can We Find Sammy Snail? - Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.desc: Slide - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flambė. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.desc: Can'T Harvey Wait / Bring It Prawn - Lucretia recounts three amazing tales of Harvey Girls fan fiction. Audrey must partner with Zoe in a shrimp-sponsored sibling beauty pageant.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Rupert Flies To Cheddar Moon - When Ping Pong uses her magic to turn Rupert's pedal car into a spaceship they fly to the moon. There they meet the Man on the Moon who runs a cheese stall.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Rupert And The Giant Egg Race - It's the day of the Nutwood Egg and Spoon race but Raggety has magically turned Ping Pong into a giant egg. How can Ruprt and the friends have their race now?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep11
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Eco Igloo - Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo'S Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Rocky-Bye - Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants / Pups Save a Yodeler - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole. // When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep163
programme.desc: Switcheroo - When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep164
programme.desc: The Missing Socks - When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Spring is Here! - It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles / Pups Save the Shivering Sheep - Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. // Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cow - When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos - Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green - Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington & says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds! // Paddington learns all about composting thanks to Mr. Mulch, but will he grow flowers in time for Aunt Lucy?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Paddington the Detective - DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep604

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Mystery of the Missing Pies - Mr. Salt's pies keep disappearing.Where did the pies go?! In this very mysterious episode, we're detectives and play Blue's Clues to find the missing pies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.desc: Lady Monkey mech / Critter care calamity - Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Berry Bad - Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef - Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep164

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125

programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Pigeon - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go?

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep208
programme.desc: No Such Luck / Frog Wild - The sisters think Lincoln is bad luck so they ban him from attending their activities. // When Lincoln finds out his class is dissecting frogs, he and Lana embark on a mission to rescue them.

programme.desc: The Secret Box / Band Geeks - Patrick has a box and won't show SpongeBob what's inside. SpongeBob's curiousity gets the best of him. // Squidward's old rival brags to Squid about his famous marching band. Feeling outdone, Squid says he has a band too.

programme.desc: Inside Russell / The Stinkhole Chronicles - Parker must save Angus from rapidly aging inside Russell's belly. // Parker and Lily go on a quest through Old Stinkhole to rescue Angus.

programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction / Frame on You - When Lily starts misbehaving at home, Mom and Dad think her new preschool friends might be the cause. // When Rusty is wrongfully suspended, the Action News Team leaps into action to clear his name.

programme.desc: Present Danger / Stressed for the Part - Dressed as David Steele, Lincoln is on the hunt for his stolen birthday present before it's destroyed. // After landing a role in a Dairyland production, Luan must hide this news from Mrs. Bernardo, who she beat out.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Ponopoly / President Annie - Annie worries her game night will be too boring, until Pony whips out his custom game, Ponopoly Plus. // The apartment building president tries to keep Annie and Pony from riding the elevator, so Annie decides she'll run for president against her.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Annie's Voice / Business as Usual - When Annie loses her voice rehearsing her song for Winter Fest, Pony offers to speak for her so she can get it back in time. // When Annie and Pony lose Dog, Pony has to take his place and fool Mrs. Okaba until Annie can get him back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep170
programme.desc: Free Samples / Home Sweet Rubble - After Plankton drives away Mr. Krabs' customers, Mr. Krabs is forced to give out free Krabby Patties to try to win them back. // SpongeBob's pineapple is falling apart, and he needs all of his friends to help him remodel it!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep171
programme.desc: Karen 2.0 / InSpongeiac - When Plankton replaces his computer wife Karen with the new, better Karen 2, the original Karen ends up working at the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob can’t get to sleep, and asks for help from Patrick… who can’t stay awake.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep172
programme.desc: Face Freeze! / Glove World R.I.P. - SpongeBob and Patrick make a bet to see who can hold a "funny face" the longest...then their faces freeze that way! // SpongeBob and Patrick spend one last glorious - and dangerous - day at Glove World before it closes for good.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep173
programme.desc: Squiditis / Demolition Doofus - When Squidward goes home sick with a fake illness, SpongeBob HypochondriacPants thinks he's caught it for real! // Mrs. Puff finally finds a use for SpongeBob's reckless driving and enters him in the Demolition Derby!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Midnight Stranger - When kung fu is outlawed, Po turns to donning a mask to fight crime.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Po Who Cried Ghost - Po's worst childhood fears come true when he comes face to face with hopping ghosts!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Penguin Stays in the Picture - Every year, Private is chosen as the cover animal for the zoo brochure. But this year the photographer discovers the adorable Mort.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep302
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper / High Moltage - It’s off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. // The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action star’s blockbuster movie!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Operation: Big Blue Marble - The Penguins are faced with a global battle when their specialty food-making machine belches out a toxic cloud that threatens not just the zoo, not just the city, but the earth itself!

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Lil Loafie / Oonski the Grateful - When T-Midi rejects a loaf of bread, SwaySway and Buhdeuce take the loaf under their wing and it becomes super famous. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce accidentally save Oonski from a monster and he owes them a debt of gratitude.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Ice Ice Baby - After getting caught in a snowstorm, Evan accidentally damages the snow ogre meant to protect local villagers and is made to stand trial for his crime.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Dorg Gets a Pimple / Dorg the Dorgnificent - Desperate for a good yearbook photo, Dorg asks Patronella to magically remove the pimple on his chin. // When Dorg tries casting a spell at his sister's birthday party and Patronella turns into a tiger, he learns that magic really does take patience.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Festa Perrfeita / O Novato Anúbis - Felicity worries that her powers won't measure up at a party for the most powerful and popular citizens in Mythlandia. // An ancient Anubis king tests Miguel to see if he's ready to leave Mythlandia and become the next ruler.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Trouble Dare / Road Pizza - The dudes play the Dicksons in an epic game of Family Double Dare. // Craig gets possessed by an evil pizza demon that wants to destroy the Frycade.

programme.desc: Ollie In The House / The Ollie Files - After getting grounded, Ollie is stuck alone in the house with no backpack and an angry moth monster. // Ollie panics when two nosy government agents show up to investigate possible monsters in Portshill.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Trading Day / The Hard Sell - In a moment of weakness, Fanboy agrees to trade Chum Chum for one of Yo's awesome toys. // Oz's mom insists he sell one of his beloved collectibles by day's end, or she will get rid of them all and turn his store into a yogurt shop.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Mall Rat / Operation: Happy Birthday - After spending time in prison, Snaptrap convinces the T.U.F.F. agents that he wants to shed his acts of villainy. But Kitty remains unconvinced. // Dudley is determined to give Kitty the best birthday of her life.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Magic Totem - Flora faces off with Icy the Ice Queen to free Helia and escape the Legendarium World. But it doesn't end there - Icy left her frosty mark on Helia's heart. Can the Winx save Helia and Fearwood?

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Queen for a Day - The Winx are determined to enter Cloudtower and lock the Legendarium. But plans are halted when Cloudtower becomes invisible! Meanwhile, Stella is queen for the day, but the power - and the Legendarium - have gone to her head.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep119

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep194
programme.desc: Patrick! The Game / The Sewers of Bikini Bottom - Patrick invents a new board game, and invites SpongeBob, Sandy and Squidward to play it with him. // After accidentally flushing Mr. Krabs’ safe, SpongeBob and Squidward must go into the sewers to find it.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Sick Day - Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to the Dagarack Convention.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep412

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep120

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Present Tense / Any Given Sundae - Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift. // Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Can't Hardly Wait / A Mutt Above - Lori takes a waitressing job at Dad's restaurant, but it turns out that serving is harder than she anticipated. // Spurred on by a classmate's mocking about Charles, Lana decides to train him to compete in a local dog show.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep307
programme.desc: The Golden Curse - The Casagrandes celebrate Paco's wedding, but they need to find las arras that Sergio lost!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Blue's Big Imagination - Imagine along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue envisions a mysterious shape to be. We listen to a story created by Slippery, Magenta and Tickety and help Mr. Salt discover his own imagination!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep625
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Opening Ceremonies / Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Adventure Bay Games - Marshall leads the pups in an Ultimate Fire Rescue when a fire threatens the Opening Ceremonies. // Chase and his police-pups must find the missing medals to save the Adventure Bay Games.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Pups Save a Tour Bus / Pups Save Midnight at the Museum - Mayor Humdinger's tour bus goes out of control in Foggy Bottom! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A museum sleepover turns awry when Alex and the mini-patrol disappear, and Mayor Goodway gets stuck on a T-Rex!

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep102

programme.desc: Jurassic Bear/Spider Lemmings/Mind in a Whirl/The Sound of a Lemming/Lemmings Indigestion/Lemming blues/Ranger Lemming - Freed by the thawing ice a mysterious giant egg slides up to the front door of the log cabin.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep7/Ep8
programme.desc: In Fear Of The Phantom/The Grasp Of The Gnome - Velma's favorite band, The Hex Girls, is in town -- and the gang has a front row seat.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep2A/Ep5B/Ep8C/Ep12A/Ep15A/Ep19B/Ep24A
programme.desc: Bats What I Like About the South/Spook House/Cry Uncle/Destruction Junction/More Powers to You/A Life Less Guarded/DJ Jerry - Tom chases Jerry into a spooky, old mansion, where Jerry comes face-to-face with a bat that looks just like him.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep104/Ep134
programme.desc: Carrot Racer/Champions Of The Day - In the Savannah, Jeff the GIRAFFE invites Bop and Boo to play with his toy racetrack.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep49/Ep4
programme.desc: Dodson’S Egg/The New Friend - Dodson has been "couch-surfing" in Lewis' living-room for a whole three days now: he needs to hatch his egg with lots of "tea, cookies and luxurious leisure!"

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep204/Ep232
programme.desc: A True Monsterpiece/Hugo The Entertainer - Simon wants to make a painting worthy of a museum, but he can’t get his paintings to turn out the way he wants.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep127/Ep149
programme.desc: The Invisible Thieves/King Willow - When Hanae sees two Fruits flying by themselves, making their way towards the bottom of the Tree, the Trio realizes the lizards must have something to do with it.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep104/Ep149
programme.desc: The Spookasaurus/The Great Dino Escape - When Jon gets spooked by a campfire story about a legendary dinosaur, he doesn't want to admit it, then eventually comes clean and learns that his family is there for him whether he's scared or not.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep349/Ep304
programme.desc: Big Sky Park Talent Show/Rob Saves The Scragglefruit - Rob and his friends put on a talent show!

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep104/Ep123
programme.desc: Fly, Chase, Fly/The Show Mush Go On - ChEp.is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep2B/Ep54B/Ep106B/Ep12B/Ep65B/Ep116B/Ep23A
programme.desc: Sun Valley Freeze/Tour De Bugs/Yankee Doodle Bunny/Scarecrow/Easter Tweets/Claire de Loon/Beaver Fever - Bugs finds himself off the beaten path with Bigfoot when they realise some hazmat suit-wearing hunters are pursuing them. Bugs must do everything he can to protect Bigfoot.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep4/Ep48
programme.desc: Fish And Visitors/Gossamer Is Awesomer - Bugs and Daffy quickly discover that Yosemite Sam is a less-than-perfect houseguest when they are forced to take him in during a rainstorm. But how to get him to leave?

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep4/Ep14/Ep26/Ep38/Ep50/Ep61/Ep72
programme.desc: Go Fetch/What A Circus/The Invitation/Fun Fur/Well Trained/White Cat/Freddy's blues - A gust of wind sends Iris' hat onto the Mikkelsen's roof and Mike sees the chance to look like a hero. He borrows Stephan's drone but the remote control falls into the racoons' hands.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep37
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and critique, we have been exposing conflicts of interest, journalistic deceit, misrepresentation, manipulation and plagiarism since 1989.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep37
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep198
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep213
programme.desc: Bringing you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and international news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: The Drum Ep198
programme.desc: In this ever-changing world, turn to Ellen Fanning and a panel of informed minds for forthright and insightful conversations on the day's news, big issues, local topics and unique personal insights on the issues that matter.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep175
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson and the 7.30 team deliver insightful public affairs journalism, in-depth reporting on the biggest stories of the day, key interviews with leading newsmakers and investigates stories of national significance.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep218
programme.desc: Karina Carvalho brings you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and global news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: The Business Ep159
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep218

programme.title: Australian Story Ep26
programme.desc: The award-winning series with no narrator and no agendas, bringing you incredible and authentic stories told entirely in people's own words. They're sometimes high profile, sometimes controversial, but always compelling.

programme.title: The World Ep218
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep2
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
